moduleMetadataJson.name: Multi Manage the screensaver of the target computer
moduleMetadataJson.description:
This module allows you to turn on or off the screensaver of the target computer and also
        lock the current session.
author: Eliott Teissonniere

options.name: WORKSPACE
options.description: Specify the workspace for this module

options.name: SESSION
options.description: The session to run this module on.
